Title: Master Thesis in Evolutionary Design of Physically Interpretable Models Leveraging Generative AI
RoleDescription:
The design of physical models for technical processes is typically a time-consuming and effortful task, particularly when physical interpretability is desired (as opposed to pure black-box modeling).
